alert.note: Alert for Coastal Atlantic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 4:28PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Ocean County through 515 PM EDT... At 428 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bamber Lake to near Tuckerton to near Brigantine. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Lakewood, Barnegat, Beachwood, Brigantine, Tuckerton, Lakehurst, Surf City, Holiday City South, Pleasant Plains, Warren Grove, Cedar Glen West, Holiday City-Berkeley, Bamber Lake, Whiting, Brookville, Pine Ridge At Crestwood, Beach Haven West, Leisure Village West-Pine Lake Park and South Toms River. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 58 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
